meta.title: Maritime Electronics Solutions | GMDSS, Navigation & Automation
meta.description: Wheelhouse provides comprehensive solutions for maritime electronics, including GMDSS, Navigation, automation, and connectivity, ensuring reliable performance.

hero.subtitle: Excellence in maritime solutions since inception
hero.description: We are committed to providing world-class maritime solutions with a focus on safety, reliability, and innovation.

overview.title: Overview
overview.desc: At Wheelhouse, every maritime electronics solution begins with understanding the needs of the vessel and its crew. We guide you through consultation, design, supply, installation, and commissioning, ensuring smooth, safe, and reliable operation at sea.

item1.title: Navigation Equipment
item1.intro: As a brand-independent supplier, Wheelhouse delivers high-quality navigation equipment from world-renowned manufacturers.
item1.imgAlt: wheelhouse service engineer with navigation equipment

item2.title: GMDSS Equipment
item2.intro: Optimize vessel operations with advanced GMDSS solutions

item3.title: Connectivity Solutions
item3.intro: From VSAT, Iridium and Starlink, our satellite solutions deliver fast, reliable connectivity so your vessel stays online anywhere in the world

item4.title: E-Navigation
item4.intro: Our e-navigation solutions integrate ECDIS systems, ENC data, and electronic publications to support safe and efficient voyage planning.
